greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{x_1|n, x_2|n, x_3|n, x_4|n} gcd(x_1,x_2,x_3,x_4).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: If p is prime, a(p) = 15 + p.
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, EulerPhi[n/#] * DivisorSigma[0, #]^4 &];  Array[a, 50] (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 10 2021 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n, i, sumdiv(n, j, sumdiv(n, k, sumdiv(n, l, gcd([i, j, k, l])))));
(PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n, i, sumdiv(n, j, sumdiv(n, k, sumdiv(n, l, n/lcm([i, j, k, l])))));
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, May 10 2021
